mapper.update: update tb_agent a set a.commpay_name=#{commpayName}, a.person= #{person}, a.phone=#{phone}, a.province=#{province}, a.city=#{city}, a.district =#{district}, a.address =#{address}, a.trading_img=#{tradingImg}, a.status= #{status}, a.add_user_id=#{addUserId}, a.add_date =#{addDate}, a.is_del=#{isDel} where a.id = #{id}
update tb_agent a set a.is_del = 1 where a.id = #{id}
